subjectDescription: Discover a full suite of online business courses that will allow you to make better business decisions and succeed in today's competitive business world. Our courses provide a rich learning experience that will allow you to develop critical business skills in areas such as business... Read more...
title: Diploma in Organizational Behaviour
headline: In this free online course, learn how to apply Organizational Behaviour strategies in the workplace.
description: This free online course on Organizational Behaviour will teach you what influences employee behaviour, how to predict that behaviour, and how this helps to better use individuals working for a company to guarantee the success of an organization. Organizational Behaviour is a field of the academic study of how people act within groups. Its principles are applied primarily in attempts to make businesses operate more effectively.
courseDescription:
This free online course on Organizational Behaviour is a field of the academic study of how people act within groups. Its principles are applied primarily in attempts to make businesses operate more effectively, build better relationships within an organization and motivates employees to perform better. First, you will be introduced to the concept of Perception, that is, a person’s understanding of reality, and how one person’s view of reality is not the same as another. Understanding what influences an individual’s “perception” will help you better understand that individual. The Art of Learning and Personality Theories such as those developed by renown psychologist Sigmund Freud will be discussed.

Next, you will learn what factors shape an individual’s personality and how a person’s personality influences their behaviour, which can help predict that behaviour. This course will also teach you about emotions, values and attitudes and how these are powerful influences in behaviour. You will learn how to manage emotions and how to change attitudes. Finally, you will learn what motivates individuals and how to motivate them, helping those within an organization to perform better.

Human behaviour in an organizational and work context is a complex phenomenon. Understanding how individuals and groups behave in the workplace will not only help improve their effectiveness but also nurture the quality of work-life of the individuals. This course will help students and those who have management responsibilities in any organization to learn about Organizational Behaviour, it’s applications and benefits. Those who bring a strong skill set or experience in organizational behaviour are likely to have a broader view of organizational dynamics, more capacity to lead in a variety of roles and have a deeper understanding about leading and managing change.  Why wait! Start this course today and increase your knowledge and understanding of Organizational Behaviour.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital : a downloadable in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • : a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked , posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed : a physical version of your officially branded and security marked in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison , you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our pricing, please visit our Pricing Page
slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • After completing this module you will be able to: 
    • Define Organization, Behaviour and Organizational Behaviour.
    • Explain the basic assumptions and fundamental ideas of Organizational Behaviour. 
    • Recognize the relationship between Organizational Behaviour and Human Resource Management. 
    • Summarize the latest historical developments in Organizational Behaviour.

  • Lesson Summary

  • What is Perception?
    • Process of giving meaning to sensory stimulus through organizing and interpreting. 
    • It's how we "see" things. 
    • Perception is an individual's view of reality. 
    • It's highly subjective.
    • New Tab

    • Principals of Perceptual Selection

         4. Feedback
         5. Consequence

  • Lesson Summery 

  • What is Personality? 
    • Relatively stable characteristics of an individual which influences his/her behaviour, attitudes, motivations and emotions. 
    • Dynamic and organized set of characteristics possessed by a person that uniquely influences his or her cognitions, motivations, and behaviours in various situations. 
  • What determines your personality?
